name: Bishoujo Hanafuda Kikou Michinoku Hitou Koi Monogatari Special
overview: Bishoujo Hanafuda Kikou Michinoku Hitou Koi Monogatari Special (美少女花札紀行 みちのく秘湯恋物語スペシャル) is a table game developed by O-Two and published by FOG for the Sega Saturn. It is based on the Japanese card game Hanafuda, and was released four months after the PlayStation version.
